wikipedia_page.main: Hamilton Knox Grogan Morgan (1807 – 9 June 1854), known as Hamilton Knox Grogan until 1828, was an Irish Whig, Repeal Association and Conservative politician.He married Sophia Maria Rowe, daughter of Ebenezer Radford Rowe, with whom he had one child: Jane Colclough Morgan (died 1872).After unsuccessfully contesting the seat as a Conservative in 1841, Morgan was elected Repeal Association MP for County Wexford at the 1847 general election. He held the seat until 1852 when he sought election as a Whig but was defeated.He was a member of the Reform Club.
